column4: I am looking to use the "sudo apt-get install" context to install several applications.  I want to install the latest versions of postfix, proftpd, apache, courier pop3, courier imap, bind9, mysql, and iptables.  I have talked to a few people about this, and they all give me contexts that make sense, but do not work.  Please give me an exact context for each, or at least the package names I need to install.  Thanks!  Keep in mind, my primary problem is finding p
use apt-cache search to search packages
